title: Chris Hemsworth rocks a new undercut hairstyle before Comic-Con
text:
He's currently in Chicago for the Comic-Con fan convention.

And on Sunday, Chris Hemsworth looked stylish as he stepped out rocking a new undercut hairdo.

The 36-year-old Avengers: Endgame star cut a relaxed figure as he made his way to the autograph signing.

Looking good! Chris Hemsworth (pictured) rocked a new undercut hairdo as he stepped out in Chicago ahead of Comic-Con on Sunday

Chris looked sharp in a white shirt, tight grey jeans and leather boots.

He appeared to be in good spirits as he clutched onto his iPhone 12.

Later in the day, he was joined by his longtime friend and personal trainer, Luke Zocchi, as he signed hundreds of autographs.

Smart casual: Chris looked sharp in a white shirt, tight grey jeans and leather boots

At one point, the Thor star was so invested in signing autographs that Luke held up a water bottle for him to drink out of.

Poking fun at himself while playing 'personal assistant' for the day, Luke bent down on all fours to offer himself as a seat for Chris to use.

It comes after Chris spent the previous weekend watching the UFC fight at Marvel Stadium in Melbourne with his wife Elsa Pataky.

Friends: Chris (left) was joined by his longtime friend and personal trainer Luke Zocchi (right) as he attended the Comic-Con event. Pictured in September

The Marvel Universe star recently announced that he was taking a break from acting to focus on his family.

'I'm just at home now, taking the next six months off and spending time with the kids and the wife,' Chris told the Men's Health Strength Sessions Podcast.

'I'm just going to make school lunches and do school drop-offs and pick-ups,' added the father-of-three.

Helping hand! At one point, the Thor star was so invested in signing autographs that Luke held up a water bottle for him to drink out of

What friends are for? Poking fun at himself while playing 'personal assistant' for the day, Luke bent down on all fours to offer himself as a seat for Chris to use

The Thor star explained that his decision to take time off at the peak of his career was not made lightly, and he struggled to decide if it was the right move.

In 2014, Elsa and Chris swapped the bright lights of Hollywood for a more relaxed lifestyle in Byron Bay, and are now nearing completion of their multi-million dollar home.

Chris and Elsa are parents to five-year-old twin boys Sasha and Tristan and seven-year-old daughter India Rose.
